briefdescription.para: MODBUS function codes (subset for this application)
Safety event types for logging and alarm management.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* safety_event_callback_t) (safety_event_t event_type, uint8_t sonicator_id, uint16_t event_data)
memberdef.name: safety_event_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback function type for safety events.

parameterdescription.para: Type of safety event that occurred
ID of associated sonicator (0 for system events)

memberdef.definition: typedef uint16_t(* modbus_register_callback_t) (uint16_t register_address, uint16_t value, bool is_write)
memberdef.name: modbus_register_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback function type for MODBUS register access.

parameterdescription.para: True for write operations, false for read

simplesect.para: Register value for read operations, 0 for write operations

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* error_notification_callback_t) (error_code_t error_code, const char *source_module, uint16_t additional_info)
memberdef.name: error_notification_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback function type for error notifications.

parameterdescription.para: Name of module that generated the error

briefdescription.para: Multi Sonicator I/O Controller - Common Type Definitions.

detaileddescription.para:
Cannasol Technologies
2025-06-27
1.0.0 @framework Arduino Framework (chosen for rapid development and proven libraries)
Common data structures, enumerations, and type definitions used throughout the Multi Sonicator I/O Controller system. Optimized for Arduino Framework with ATmega32A microcontroller.
